Class XpathAssertions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.test.web.reactive.server.XpathAssertions

  • public class XpathAssertions
extends Object
    XPath assertions for the WebTestClient.

    5.1
    Author:
    Eric Deandrea, Rossen Stoyanchev
